About

Data science and linguistics student blending quantitative rigor with human-centered insights—currently based in Chicago, always looking for new narratives in language, mobility, and brands.

Education

University of Chicago — Chicago, IL
B.S. Data Science · B.A. Linguistics · Sep 2022 — May 2026
Dean’s List (2022–24); Robert Maynard Hutchins Scholar (2023–24) · GPA: 3.94/4.00
Relevant coursework: Probability · Linear Algebra · Models in Data Science · Data Engineering

Professional Experience

Research Assistant, Language Processing Lab — University of Chicago · Chicago, IL · Jan 2025 — Present

  • Design psycholinguistic experiments in PCIbex with custom JavaScript to study context effects.
  • Clean and reshape multilingual datasets to enable reproducible analyses across collaborators.
  • Coordinate 10+ hours per week of lab communication, annotation reviews, and data QA.

Language Assistant, Center for East Asian Studies — University of Chicago · Chicago, IL · Jan 2025 — Present

  • Lead biweekly grammar and vocabulary sessions for 10+ Korean-language learners.
  • Plan and execute weekly cultural programming that deepens engagement with Korean language.
  • Support day-to-day department operations and mentor students on study strategies.

Project Participant, Data Science Clinic — University of Chicago · Chicago, IL · Mar 2025 — Jun 2025

  • Built a Dockerized, multi-page Streamlit dashboard visualizing university shuttle performance.
  • Modeled rider wait-time patterns across 10+ variables to inform UGo shuttle route planning.
  • Authored public-facing documentation, including the final findings report and live project site.

Research Assistant, Boston Consulting Group (BCG) · Seoul, South Korea · Jun 2024 — Aug 2024

  • Evaluated semiconductor client’s AI market entry by quantifying addressable demand and competitor landscape.
  • Synthesized expert interviews and primary research into weekly C-level briefings.
  • Constructed financial projections in Excel to support strategic recommendations.

K30 Biho Air-Defense Gunner, Republic of Korea Army · Goyang-si, South Korea · Oct 2020 — Apr 2022

  • Partnered with DMZ-based teams for rapid anti-air readiness drills and live-fire qualification.
  • Trained peers on advanced air-defense systems while maintaining top combat capability ratings.
  • Handled explosives and electronic systems under strict safety and security protocols.
